Race.SpecificTitle: Bear Lake FPD No.1 -- $106 Service Charge - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Bear Lake Fire Protection District No. 1 Proposition
(Service Charge)

Summary:  Authority to assess and collect an annual service charge not to exceed $106 for a period of 10 years, for paying the costs of fire protection services in and for said District, including the cost of acquiring and collecting said service charge.
Race.FullText: Shall Bear Lake Fire Protection District No. 1 of the Parish of Madison, State of Louisiana (the "District"), assess and collect an annual service charge of not to exceed One Hundred Six Dollars ($106.00) from persons owning each residential or commercial structure, whether occupied or unoccupied, located wholly or partly within the boundaries of the District, for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2008 and ending with the year 2017 (an estimated $22,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the service charge for an entire year) for the purpose of paying the costs of fire protection services in and for the District, including the cost of acquiring and collecting said service charge; provided owners shall be assessed a service charge for each such structure which they own, each residential or commercial unit and each housing unit within a dwelling structure shall be considered a separate structure and a mobile home, as defined in R. S. 9:1149.2(3), shall be considered a structure and persons owning mobile homes shall be assessed eighty percent (80%) of the service charge, all as provided in Section 1502.4 of Title 40 of the Louisiana Revised Statutes of 1950, as amended (R.S. 40:1502.4)?
